Replace.Text: When the Beast Mansion is adjacent to an area or a Sleeping Black Tea, it will receive an additional adjacent bonus of 1.14 points [ICON_Science] technology value and 1.14 points [ICON_Culture] culture value. Among them, adjacent to the Sleeping Black Tea, an additional 2 points will be obtained. Adjacent bonus points of [ICON_Food] food and 2 points of [ICON_Gold] gold coins. These additional adjacency bonuses will not be affected by policies, etc., but after studying municipal "theology", the area will provide three times the original additional adjacency bonus to the Beast Mansion. The cost of using [ICON_Faith] faith points to sponsor great people is reduced by 19.19%.

Pressure Massenet: Each time you recruit a [ICON_GreatScientist] great scientist, you will receive a random technology [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka. [NEWLINE] King's Journey, Bubble Bath: All units +1[ICON_Movement] movement power, combat units +5[ICON_Strength] combat power.
I like civilizations with high technology values ​​and hate civilizations with low technology values.

Koji Tadokoro, you have created the most glorious inm culture. Every day, hundreds of people come to the Beast Mansion to pay homage to your holy relics. Let your citizens, under your leadership, rep the world!

Shimokitazawa's special light cavalry unit can be obtained each time the Beast Mansion is built, or it can be purchased by spending a large amount of faith points. It initially has 3 points of [ICON_Movement] mobility and 25 points of [ICON_Strength] combat power. It requires no maintenance fees and has a 1.5 times support bonus and combat experience value. It is currently studying iron smelting, apprenticeship, gunpowder, military science, parts standardization, and satellites. After studying technology, each will increase 12 points of [ICON_Strength] combat power; after studying apprenticeship, military science, and satellite technology, it will increase 1 point of [ICON_Movement] mobility. After researching the nationalist municipal administration, the combat effectiveness will be increased by 10 points [ICON_Strength], and after researching the mobilization municipal administration, the combat effectiveness will be increased by 7 points [ICON_Strength]. The escorting unit gains all of homo's [ICON_Movement] movement and increases homo's +5 [ICON_Strength] combat strength. +5 [ICON_Strength] combat strength adjacent to a homo unit. -8[ICON_Strength] combat strength when defending. Killing enemy units by homo will spread the religion (or mainstream religion) founded by Shimokitazawa to surrounding cities. Has a unique upgrade tree.

Shimokitazawa's special light cavalry unit can be obtained each time the Beast Mansion is built, or it can be purchased by spending a large amount of faith points. It initially has 3 points of [ICON_Movement] mobility and 25 points of [ICON_Strength] combat power. It requires no maintenance fees and has a 1.5 times support bonus and combat experience value. After researching the nationalist municipal administration, the combat effectiveness will be increased by 10 points [ICON_Strength], and after researching the mobilization municipal administration, the combat effectiveness will be increased by 7 points [ICON_Strength]. Killing enemy units by homo will spread the religion (or mainstream religion) founded by Shimokitazawa to surrounding cities. Has a unique upgrade tree.
Shimokitazawa's unique unit from ancient times, replacing the Scout. Compared to the Scout, it has +1[ICON_Movement] movement and +2 vision range, and -5[ICON_Strength] combat power.
Shimokitazawa's unique unit from ancient times, replacing the Scout. Compared to the Scout, it has +1[ICON_Movement] movement and +2 vision range, and -5[ICON_Strength] combat power.
Shimokitazawa's characteristic religious unit, replacing missionaries. Lower faith cost and two additional missions.
Shimokitazawa's characteristic religious unit, replacing missionaries. Lower faith cost and two additional missions.

Replaces the Holy Land and is cheaper to build. Gain +2 [ICON_Faith] faith points from the adjacent characteristic area and city center, and gain +2 [ICON_Faith] faith points from the adjacent Sleeping Black Tea. Provides a +2 adjacent bonus to adjacent featured areas.

Replaces the Holy Land and is cheaper to build. Gain +2 [ICON_Faith] faith points from the adjacent characteristic area and city center, and gain +2 [ICON_Faith] faith points from the adjacent Sleeping Black Tea. Provides a +2 adjacent bonus to adjacent featured areas.

+2 [ICON_Food] Food comes from adjacent Sleepy Black Tea.
+2 [ICON_Gold] Gold from adjacent Sleepy Black Tea.

The characteristic improvement facilities of the Shimokitazawa Empire are unlocked through the [ICON_Science] technology "Irrigation" and can only be built on black tea. The productivity bonus provided by black tea is removed and instead provides +1 [ICON_Food] food and +1 [ICON_Science] technology. +1[ICON_Culture] culture, +1[ICON_Faith] faith. When adjacent to the Beast Mansion, it will provide 1 [ICON_GreatProphet] point.

Shimokitazawa Empire special project, unlock: Technology "Education" [NEWLINE] Requires: Special area "Beast Mansion" [NEWLINE] Effect: After completion, all Beast Mansion will provide 1 point of [ICON_Amenities] habitability, and make the city [ICON_Production ] Productivity is permanently increased by 11.4% and can be completed 5 times
"Journey of the King" provides +5[Icon_Strength] combat power
+8 Defense debuff removed from upgrade "One Turn Offensive"
Escape for a moment, miss for a lifetime
Looting only consumes 1 point of [ICON_Movement] movement.
Gain an additional 10 health points from looted loot
[ICON_Strength] combat strength debuff when canceling defense
Mobility allows an additional attack and can be moved after attacking
+10 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when fighting an enemy with lower combat strength than yourself
I really can't remember anything else

After researching iron smelting, apprenticeship, gunpowder, military science, parts standardization, and satellite technology, each will increase the attack power by 12 points [ICON_Strength]; after researching the nationalist municipal administration, it will increase the attack power by 10 points, and after researching the mobilization municipal administration, it will increase the attack power by 7 points. [ICON_Strength] Attack power.

Pressure on Massenet! This can be done
I don't want to be with someone like you
What about that... Actually, my house has a roof... Why don't you come and show off your hair?
You are just as cute as my junior Tono!
OK! come! Hit it on the chest! On the chest!
Just now when I was blasting troops, were you peeking?
I've been waiting for a long time. Although there is only black tea, you won't mind, right?
Hello, I am Tadokoro Koji, 24 years old, a student, height is 170cm, weight is 74kg
Hello, I am Tadokoro Koji, 24 years old, a student, height is 170cm, weight is 74kg
Hello, I am Tadokoro Koji, 24 years old, a student, height is 170cm, weight is 74kg
May you have a strong Ringo
It turns out you also like Lepu and others
(Tasho Koji's favor for you has increased)
You are one, one and one...ah! !
(Tasho Koji's favor with you has decreased)
Great, I heard there is a delicious ramen stall nearby, don’t you want to go?
Well... let's sit down and talk.
No, no, the great Shimokitazawa cannot tolerate people like you trampling on it.
I think you won't mind if my people need to pass through your country to get to Lepu.
My troops have been exercising recently and are not afraid of your insects at all!
